body_html: @michaelulin This is a bug, and it was fixed in onnx-caffe2 (onnx/onnx-caffe2@f7509f2). If you download and install that commit (don't install a more recent one; there was a BC breaking change in onnx which requires PyTorch updates that don't exist yet) that should fix your problem. Let us know if it doesn't.

body: @michaelulin This is a bug, and it was fixed in onnx-caffe2 (https://github.com/onnx/onnx-caffe2/commit/f7509f293d781638ef14ac3d232de0c140ed8277). If you download and install that commit (don't install a more recent one; there was a BC breaking change in onnx which requires PyTorch updates that don't exist yet) that should fix your problem. Let us know if it doesn't.
